title: Installation issue: charmpp
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install charmpp
==> Installing charmpp
==> Searching for binary cache of charmpp
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for charmpp found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /root/code/python/github.com/spack/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/85/85ed660e46eeb7a6fc6b32deab08226f647c244241948f6b592ebcd2b6050cbd.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-charmpp-6.9.0-tahwgg6f7bzttzpwruq764gve2wunm3x/charm-6.9.0.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-charmpp-6.9.0-tahwgg6f7bzttzpwruq764gve2wunm3x
==> No patches needed for charmpp
==> Building charmpp [Package]
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: TypeError: expected str, bytes or os.PathLike object, not NoneType

/root/code/python/github.com/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/charmpp/package.py:174, in install:
        171        # here.
        172        options = [
        173            os.path.basename(self.compiler.cc),
  >>    174            os.path.basename(self.compiler.fc),
        175            "-j%d" % make_jobs,
        176            "--destination=%s" % prefix,
        177        ]

```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux localhost.localdomain 3.10.0-957.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Nov 8 23:39:32 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
